text: Charles Wyrsch (July 5, 1920 â€“ June 16, 2019) was a Swiss contemporary artist and painter. He was born in Buochs, Nidwalden. Wyrsch's artistic career was based on the expressive of figurative paintings, which he gave up in favor of abstraction for about ten years, to return to the figurative. Wyrsch died on June 16, 2019 at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Swiss painters Category:Nidwalden Category:20th- century painters Category:21st-century painters
title: Charles Wyrsch
